Name: FaceFun
About the game: FaceFun is a virtual character simulation software, it can capture the user's face expression and head position changes in real-time through webcam, these actions are synchronized to the lovely animated characters. vup,youtuber,vtuber use. Version 2.0 Supportï¼š Vrm and Live2d Unlimited Import! Live2d Support File Type: .model3.json The back button is hidden in the upper left corner of the model character window. Mouse Scroll forward: zoom out characters Mouse Scroll backward: zoom in the character The mouse can drag the model at will. FaceFun can be used when recording videos, live broadcasting, and other entertainment. Feature >use the Live2d Virtual Role. >Synchronize facial expressions and head movements in real time. >Window can be freely adjusted to the size you like. >Support Windows and Mac OS X. Note: Software needs to capture the user's facial movements in real time, so a computer or laptop needs a working webcam.
